message.raw: Merged: oleh_derevenko#1916: Fixed issue with some kinds of joints (Ball, DBall, DHinge, Fixed) might overwrite world ERP value with their custom ERP during getInfo2() call and that inappropriate value would then be passed to subsequent joints in solver instead of world ERP.
message.html: Merged: oleh_derevenko#1916: Fixed issue with some kinds of joints (Ball, DBall, DHinge, Fixed) might overwrite world ERP value with their custom ERP during getInfo2() call and that inappropriate value would then be passed to subsequent joints in solver instead of world ERP.

message: Merged: oleh_derevenko#1916: Fixed issue with some kinds of joints (Ball, DBall, DHinge, Fixed) might overwrite world ERP value with their custom ERP during getInfo2() call and that inappropriate value would then be passed to subsequent joints in solver instead of world ERP.
